Package comp3111.popnames.core

Class ChartSetter

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.core.ChartSetter
public class ChartSetter
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used for generating charts and tables

  • Method Details

    • BarChartSetter

      public static void BarChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<NameRecord> nameRecords)
      A bar chart generator using name record
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - bar comment
      nameRecords - the data to show (the name and its occurrences)

    • BarChartSetter2

      public static void BarChartSetter2​(javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<OccurrenceRecord> record)
      A bar chart generator using occurrence record
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - bar comment
      record - the data to show (year, occurrence)

    • BarChartSetter3

      public static void BarChartSetter3​(javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<NameScorePair> pairs)
      A bar chart generator using NameScorePair
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - bar comment
      pairs - the data to show (year, occurrence)

    • BarChartSetter

      public static void BarChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Number> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<java.lang.String> xData, java.util.List<java.lang.Number> yData)
      Full bar chart generator You need to pass the raw data in a list of string for x and a list of number for y
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - bar comment
      xData - data for x-axis, should be String List
      yData - data for y-axis, should be Number List

    • PieChartSetter

      public static void PieChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.PieChart chart, java.lang.String title, java.util.List<NameRecord> nameRecords)
      A pie chart generator using name record
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      nameRecords - data to display (name and its occurrences)

    • PieChartSetter

      public static void PieChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.PieChart chart, java.lang.String title, java.util.List<java.lang.String> xData, java.util.List<java.lang.Number> yData)
      Full version of pie chart generator You need to pass the raw data in a list of string and a list of number
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xData - data in String List, which shows the name of each part
      yData - data in Number List, which shows the amount of each part

    • LineChartSetter

      public static void LineChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<OccurrenceRecord> record)
      A bar chart generator using occurrence record
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - bar comment
      record - the data to show (year, occurrence)

    • LineChartSetter

      public static void LineChartSetter​(javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> chart, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String xTitle, java.lang.String yTitle, java.lang.String seriesTitle, java.util.List<java.lang.String> xData, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> yData)
      Full version of line chart generator You need to pass the raw data in a list of string and a list of integer
      Parameters:
      chart - the output chart
      title - the chart title
      xTitle - x-axis title/comment
      yTitle - y-axis title/comment
      seriesTitle - line comment
      xData - data in String List, which shows the name of each point
      yData - data in Integer List, which shows the number of each point

    • TableSetter

      public static void TableSetter​(javafx.scene.control.TableView table, int columnNum, java.lang.String[] columnName, javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.util.Map> dataMap)
      Full version of table generator You need to pass a list of data in Map structure
      Parameters:
      table - the output table
      columnNum - the number of columns
      columnName - an array of column names
      dataMap - an ObservableList of Map contains data you want to display
